shop hire us

no.nonsense is sort of a collaborative design & development agency

no.nonsense is a sandbox for side projects made by a group of designers and developers. many of us are usually available to work on your projects, too—holla at us here about what you're working on and we'll see who all is onboard.

people

our team is mostly Chicago-based and have worked together professionally outside of no.nonsense. organized loosely by attractiveness

    co-founder/developer

  • josh martin

    co-founder/designer

    animator

  • max davis

    architect

  • kevin lafin

    designer/illustrator
